document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Galleruca analis
: lectotype ♀ ( KIEL ), here designated, labeled: “Weber / analis . / 1743 [w, h] // analis [w, h]”. This is the only specimen available in Fabricius’ collection. It is uncertain if there are other type specimens.

Galeruca quadraria
: lectotype ♀ ( MNHN ), here designated, labeled: “ Galeruca / quadraria / Oliv. [h, w] // SY 6 / 36 [h, w, circle label] //
TYPE
[p, r] // MUSÉUM PARIS / COLL . GÉNÉRALE [p, y] // G. quadraria / Oliv. / Java / Coll. Labillardiere [h, y] // SYNTYPE [p, r] // SYNTYPE / Aulacophora /
quadraria (
Olivier, 1808
)
[p, w] // MNHN / EC 4692 [p, w]”. This is the only specimen found at the MNHN , It is uncertain if there are other type specimens.

Diagnosis.
Aulacophora analis
is similar to
A. bicolor
with yellowish brown body and black spots on the elytron but
A. analis
display the characteristic and uniform patterns of arrangement of black spots on the elytron which is different from
A. bicolor
.

Host plant. Cucurbitaceae :
Trichosanthes quinquangulata A. Gray
(present study).
Distribution. Indonesia , Malaysia (Sabah), Philippines , Taiwan (only Lanyu Island).
